price: 73. Nabiyow! koros nanu wacyih koi oobisne Qhuraanak koo make raarra hayte nanu wacyih koi oobisne Qhuraanak kalah tanim diraabah nel ginnaasittamkeh, toysa atu usun kok faxaanam abinnitoy kaxxa kacnoytah koo haysitak yenen.
arabic: وَإِن كَادُواْ لَيَفۡتِنُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡكَ لِتَفۡتَرِيَ عَلَيۡنَا غَيۡرَهُۥۖ وَإِذٗا لَّٱتَّخَذُوكَ خَلِيلٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-in kādū layaftinūnaka ʿani alladhī awḥaynā ilayka litaftariya ʿalaynā ghayrahu wa-idhan la-ittakhadhūka khalīlan
